title: Normalizer Quotients of Symmetric Groups and Inner Holomorphs
abstract:
We show that every finite group $T$ is isomorphic to a normalizer quotient
$N_{S_n}(H)/H$ for some $n$ and a subgroup $H\leq S_n$. We show that this holds
for all large enough $n\ge n_0(T)$ and also with $S_n$ replaced by $A_n$. The
two main ingredients in the proof are a recent construction due to Cornulier
and Sambale of a finite group $G$ with $\mathrm{Out}(G)\cong T$ (for any given
finite group $T$) and the determination of the normalizer in $\mathrm{Sym(G)}$
of the inner holomorph $\mathrm{InHol}(G)\leq\mathrm{Sym}(G)$ for any
centerless indecomposable finite group $G$, which may be of independent
interest.
